name: changedetection-browser-extension
description: Browser extension to monitor changedetection.io watches

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build:chrome
scripts.build:chrome: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json background.js popup.html popup.js popup.css options.html options.js options.css content.js dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.build:firefox: mkdir -p dist-firefox && cp manifest-v2.json dist-firefox/manifest.json && cp background.js popup.html popup.js popup.css options.html options.js options.css content.js dist-firefox/ && cp -r icons dist-firefox/
scripts.package: npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist && zip -r ../changedetection-extension-chrome-v1.0.0.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' '*.git*'
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist-firefox && zip -r ../changedetection-extension-firefox-v1.0.0.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' '*.git*'
scripts.dev:firefox: echo 'Firefox: Use manifest-v2.json -> about:debugging -> Load Temporary Add-on -> select manifest-v2.json'
scripts.dev:chrome: echo 'Chrome: Load dist/ directory -> chrome://extensions/ -> Enable Developer mode -> Load unpacked -> select dist/ directory'
scripts.firefox-setup: cp manifest-v2.json manifest.json && echo 'Switched to Firefox-compatible manifest. Load extension normally.'
scripts.chrome-setup: git checkout manifest.json 2>/dev/null || echo 'Using default Chrome manifest'
